    Classes in org.jscience.mathematics.analysis.chaos that implement interfaces with type arguments of type Point2D
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ArnoldCatMap
    Arnold's Cat Map: x_{n+1} = (2x_n + y_n) mod 1 y_{n+1} = (x_n + y_n) mod 1
    class 
    HenonMap
    The HÃ©non Map: x_{n+1} = 1 - a * x_n^2 + y_n y_{n+1} = b * x_n
    class 
    StandardMap
    The Standard Map (Chirikov-Taylor map): p_{n+1} = (p_n + K * sin(theta_n)) mod 2Ï€ theta_{n+1} = (theta_n + p_{n+1}) mod 2Ï€
